hero.headline:
Count your tokens.
Like beads on an abacus.
hero.description: — monitor budgets, optimize context, and cut AI costs before they add up. A VS Code extension that makes the invisible visible.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
steps: Install from the VS Code Marketplace or run `ext install tokalator`
Click the Tokalator icon in the Activity Bar — the sidebar dashboard opens
Type `@tokalator /count` in Copilot or Claude Chat to see your token budget
Pin important files with `/pin` so they always stay in context
Run `/optimize` to get a full health report on your context window
